text: Summer Is Over () is a 1963 Soviet comedy movie directed by Nikita Orlov and Rolan Bykov.ПРОПАЛО ЛЕТО It stars Vladimir Yevstafyev, Sergei Gudko, and Zoya Fyodorova. == Actors == * Vladimir Yevstafyev as Zheka Ruchkin * Sergei Gudko as Valera Bulyshev * Zoya Fyodorova as aunt Dasha * Antonina Dmitrieva as aunt Masha * Lyudmila Chernyshyova as aunt Sasha * Aleksandr Lebedev as policeman Muravey == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1963 movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Summer Is Over (movie)
